title: Smokey and the hot wire gang
creator_credit: Westernro, Ace Pix and Anthony Cardoza
brief_description: Car chases abound in this action-packed story of a youth gang who strike fear into the citizens of a small town with their crazy and dangerous speed racing and the efforts of a group of truckers to locate a beautiful, hot-rodding car thief. Cast includes George Barris, James Keach and Carla Ziegfield.
